title: I tried to doodle illaoi
body:
https://i.imgur.com/uyjxXjs.png

She's my fav female character in league, that hair, those earrings :3

replies.body: i thought that was marilyn monroe for a sec. looks really good tho
Somehow reminds me of Marilyn Monroe, could be nice to see Illaoi in makeup and a dress for a skin.
Looks like a young version of her, least I'd imagine. Very nice.

ABSOLUTELY ADORABLE!
I love the style, kinda makes me think she can have a Greaser-style skin!
